channel.title: Account freezing
channel.description: Hi, on Rs3server, I am an admin and whenever i log into my account i have to hit an icon besides the inventory or it will freeze. Whenever i try to go into my inventory I will freeze. Whenever i go into my bank i freeze. Whenever I accept a trade i freeze. Can anyone help me out here! its so annoying!

item.title: Account freezing
item.dc:creator: @XzXz XzXz
item.description:
@XzXz wrote:

Well i have the client and this recently happened but out of nowhere it stopped acting up. But it happens when i enter an invalid pickup code for the server. But i have no idea how to get out of it. It was 2 weeks before it finally stopped.

Read full topic

item.title: Account freezing
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

It sounds like either a very glitchy server, or a very glitchy Client. Try connecting to the server with a different client. If that doesn’t work, than it must be a problem with the server. If you talk to other people in the server, and when they play it’s perfectly fine, than it’s neither a problem with the client, or server, but your computer. What’s your RAM and CPU speed?

Read full topic

item.title: Account freezing
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Get the client for the server.

Read full topic
